group.label: Bank Transfers
group.comment: Bank transfers provide a safe way for customers to send money over bank rails. Stripe provides your customers with a virtual bank account number that they can push money to from their own online bank interface or in-person bank branch. Your real bank account details are not exposed to customers. Suitable for accepting large payments that card networks would otherwise decline. To accept bank transfers, configure the bank transfer payment method from the Payment Methods page.
